field.name: summary
field.value: Changing the lifestyleType of a component in a facility, does not change the lifestylemanager

field.name: description
field.value:
When creating your own Facility, handling the Kernel.ComponentCreated event and changing the lifestyletype of an object. The objects associated IHandler objects' LifestyleManager does not change.
It's exactly like the Starter facility example if we would also add a line of code that would change the lifestyletype in the OnComponentCreated, the lifestylemanager under water is not changed.
